sentences.english: And maybe they continue to improve their arsenals.
sentences.chinese: 也許他們會繼續改進其核武庫。

sentences.english: North Korea has for years relied on its nuclear build-up to squeeze aid from its neighbors and the United States.
sentences.chinese: 北韓多年來靠本國的核武庫向鄰國及美國榨取援助。

sentences.english: This commitment will ensure that our arsenal remains ready.
sentences.chinese: 這一承諾將確保我們的核武庫常備不懈。

sentences.english: And this government and the United Stingesteds still does not haudio-videoe the power to hold nuclear toolboxs.
sentences.chinese: 猶太復國主義政府和美國沒有掌握核武庫的才力。
